course_title: Adult/Gerontology Primary Care Nurse Practitioner II
class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous sessions. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This is the second in a series focused on diagnosing and managing health problems in adults and older adults. Emphasis is on the role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant, and interdisciplinary team member in primary, transitional, and long-term care settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 565D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1603, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Closed
